properties.name: openrouteservice.apikey
properties.description: The API key to connect to the openrouteservice

properties.name: openrouteservice.ratelimit
properties.description: The limit for sending requests (per minute)

properties.name: openrouteservice.apiversion
properties.description: The API Version to be used (should probably always be `v2`

properties.name: transportation.distances.maxscooterdistance
properties.description: The max distance a scooter could travel on full battery (in km)

properties.name: transportation.distances.maxwalkingdistance
properties.description: The max distance we would want the user to walk (in km)

properties.name: transportation.speeds.boatspeed
properties.description: The average sea taxi speed (in kn)

properties.name: datafiles.carLocations
properties.description: A JSON file containing the locations of the cars to preload

properties.name: datafiles.portLocations
properties.description: A JSON file containing the locations of the ports to preload
